scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:zip
scripts.pretest:codecept: npm run build:main || echo '⚠️  Build failed, tests may fail if build assets are missing'
scripts.test:codecept: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-ide/ -- bash -c 'export TEST_DB_HOST=${WORDPRESS_DB_HOST:-tests-mysql} TEST_DB_NAME=${WORDPRESS_DB_NAME:-tests-wordpress} TEST_DB_USER=${WORDPRESS_DB_USER:-root} TEST_DB_PASSWORD=${WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_WP_URL=${TEST_WP_URL:-http://tests-wordpress} TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX=${TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX:-wp_} TEST_WP_DOMAIN=${TEST_WP_DOMAIN:-localhost} TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME=${TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME:-admin} TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_ADMIN_PATH=${TEST_ADMIN_PATH:-/wp-admin} TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL=${TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL:-admin@example.org} TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER=${TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER:-/var/www/html} && vendor/bin/codecept "$@"' --
